remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 不是自治服务器实体。 are not autonomous server entities. 相反，服务是托管在一个环境，如 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 提供核心服务器的网络功能的组件。Instead, the service is a component hosted in an environment such as the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) that provides core server networking facilities. 具体而言，服务不会不绑定到和网络套接字上侦听传入请求到其具象状态传输 (REST) 入口点。Specifically, a service does not bind to and listen on a network socket for incoming requests to its Representational State Transfer (REST) entry points. 宿主将处理与网络的直接交互并支持缓存、可伸缩性和身份验证模块。The host handles direct interactions with the network and support caching, scalability, and authentication modules. [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 定义泛型宿主接口，后者从特定主机其实现。 defines a generic hosting interface that abstracts its implementation from a specific host. 这允许[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]在一定范围的宿主环境中运行。This allows [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to run in a range of hosting environments. 有关详细信息，请参阅[承载数据服务](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Hosting the Data Service](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md).
